name: Name
be_always_on_the_same_way:
Be always on the same way
with your friends
alpha_4: Please if you found some errors, weird behaviour, new great idea or just because - feel free to send us an e-mail:
alpha_7: Go to the main page of project (new window).
gps_location_required_1: The purpose of this service is to help friends find each other.
gps_location_required_2: To do this, send your location to your friends.
gps_location_required_3: Now the browser should ask you about using your location information. Answer him "Allow", otherwise your friends will not be able to see where you are.
gps_location_required_5: If you already disallowed the geolocation then the browser can remember your decision. Then you have to clear the settings for this site. Click question mark in the right bottom corner to get the detailed instruction.
user_took_too_long_to_grant_deny_geoloca: User took too long to grant/deny geolocation permission.
request_to_geolocation_is_timed_out: The request to geolocation is timed out.
unknown_error_occurred_while_requesting_: An unknown error occurred while requesting geolocation.
please_resolve_this_problem_and_try_agai: %s Please resolve this problem and try again. Note that geolocation is required for working this service properly.
your_name_is_not_defined: Your name is not defined. Set up your name now?
you_have_added_location: You have added location. It can be found under "Saved locations" menu. Would you like to do something else?
let_your_email_client_compose_the_messag: Let your e-mail client compose the message with link to this location?
you_re_going_to_send_the_location_s_to_a: You're going to send the location %s to all. Continue?
add_it_to_your_saved_locations_list: Add it to your saved locations list?
saved_location_popup_blocked_1: Perhaps, your browser blocks pop-ups. If so please unlock this ability for calling e-mail properly.
saved_location_popup_blocked_2: Detailed information how to unblock this feature
saved_location_popup_blocked_3: Also, you can send the link manually. Copy it clicking on the button below.
street_view_is_still_not_available_for_t: Street view is still not available for this place.
street_view_available_only_for_one_point: Street view available only for one point.
tracking_share_link_dialog_1: Let your e-mail client compose the message with link to this group?
tracking_share_link_dialog_2: You can add there all your friends you'd like.
tracking_popup_blocked_dialog_1: Looks like your browser is blocking pop-ups. If so please unlock this ability for calling e-mail properly.
tracking_popup_blocked_dialog_2: Detailed information how to unblock this feature
tracking_popup_blocked_dialog_3: Also, you can send the link manually. Copy it clicking on the button below.
tracking_beforeunload: You are online in the group with your friends. Leaving this page you will exit the group.
tracking_help_body_1:
You have created the new tracking group. Now, you may invite your friends to follow you using their Waytogo client or mobile or desktop browser. Click the main menu item to share the link. Or you may use it yourself for some reasons.

Note: the group will be deleted after 15 minutes of inactivity.
